description: This file defines a Java class 'RetailerAScraper' that implements the 'RetailerScraper' interface. It provides placeholder implementation for scraping retailer A's website, including methods for returning the retailer's name, base URL, product-specific URL, and fetching product price based on product ID. The class uses Spring annotations for component scanning and configuration properties.

classes.name: RetailerAScraper
classes.description: A stub implementation of 'RetailerScraper' interface for retailer A, providing basic methods for retrieving retailer information and product price.

methods.name: retailerName
methods.description: Returns the name of the retailer, 'RetailerA'.

methods.name: baseUrl
methods.description: Returns the base URL for the retailer, configured via application properties.

methods.name: fetchPriceFor
methods.description: Fetches the product price, with placeholder logic that calculates a pseudo-random price based on product ID.

methods.name: productUrl
methods.description: Constructs and returns the URL for a specific product.
